benefits.name: Ability Score Increase
effects: Increase your Strength or Dexterity score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

benefits.name: Hamstring
effects: Once per turn when you hit a creature with an attack that deals Slashing damage, you can reduce the Speed of that creature by 10 feet until the start of your next turn.

benefits.name: Enhanced Critical
effects: When you score a Critical Hit that deals Slashing damage to a creature, it has Disadvantage on attack rolls until the start of your next turn.
